ruleset.name: Apex Documentation Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex documentation standards

rule.name: ExceptionDocumentationRequired
rule.message: Methods that throw exceptions must document them with @throws or @exception tag in ApexDoc
rule.description: Methods that contain throw statements must document the exceptions they throw using @throws or @exception tags in their ApexDoc comments. This rule checks methods that have ApexDoc comments but are missing the required @throws or @exception documentation for exceptions they throw.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //Method[ .//ThrowStatement and FormalComment and contains(FormalComment/@Image, '/**') and not(contains(FormalComment/@Image, '@throws')) and not(contains(FormalComment/@Image, '@exception')) ]
